summary:
I have completed all 8 tasks in the company-seo-pages session:

## Summary

**Completed in this iteration:**

### Task 5: Update routes for new URL structure
- Changed canonical company detail URL to `/sahkosopimus/sahkoyhtiot/{slug}`
- Renamed route from `company.detail.new` to `company.detail`
- Added 301 redirect from old `/sahkosopimus/yritys/{slug}` path
- Updated `/yritys/{slug}` redirect to use new canonical URL

### Task 6: Add navigation links to layout
- Added "Sähköyhtiöt" link in desktop navigation after "Yrityksille"
- Added "Sähköyhtiöt" link in mobile menu after "Yrityksille"
- Added "Sähköyhtiöt" link in footer "Sähkösopimukset" section

### Task 7: Update sitemap service
- Updated company URLs from `/sahkosopimus/yritys/{slug}` to `/sahkosopimus/sahkoyhtiot/{slug}`
- Added `/sahkosopimus/sahkoyhtiot` (companies list) with priority 0.85
- Added `/sahkosopimus/yritykselle` (business contracts) with priority 0.8

### Task 8: Run tests and verify no regressions
- All 72 co
